text: @marcorubio @marcorubio are all the Florida hospitals equipped to even test for the coronavirus?The reporting, take a few minutes and watch/rewatch the POTUS news conference again from last night. I’d be more concerned about the mixed messages we received. Is it just starting or almost over?

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
